channel.title: Juggle Action Military on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Juggle Action Military on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Hmm..
item.description: I am watching red dawn. whoa. that movie is very interesting. especially in light of the current situation with our world. I wouldn’t be surprised if an offensive was targeted on U.S. soil if a military action was initiated. I juggled for 25min tonight. practicing doubles - and all that jazz.
